author: oğulcan Mercan
description:
If we consider the possible transmission channels of ebola the most mobile and uncontrolleble ones are flying ones, that is fruit bats.
Whether we stop  or not within humans if we dont control the most mobile cause it will be always uncontrollable.
The solution must not alter the ecosystem balance.
I suggest attracting fruit bats to spesific areas and exposing them to low level Co60 gamma radiation rays in high risk hot climate countries in africa. Those areas must be  human free zones such as  some selected areas of forests  within fences. Hundreds of gamma radiators will  be active during a period of time  changing locations  during year. Local countries will corporate in organizing the operation and  update  bat cleaning  maps and  share.
The same precaution can also be considered on death bodies before burial.
summary: I suggest attracting fruit bats to spesific areas and exposing them to gamma radiation in high risk hot climate countries in africa.
title: exposing bats to gamma radiation
